message.body: Are you going to Hillary's tonight? Rage cage.
I wasn't invited.
I was only invited today in what seemed to be a mass text. I didn't go, I'm in the library like a geek
Geeks rule.
Oh is this the holiday throw down?
Hey thanks. Yeah, the annual
Whatcha studying? I'm driving to new york tmmrw..
I'm writing my paper on the archeological record of Gilgamesh. I'm not sure what to do with it. What are you doing in NY?
Good old Gilgamesh. Getting a tattoo! ￼
That's awesome! Where are you getting it?
On my inner arm maybe. I'm think on just having it be the fox head and duck. Thoughts?
I like that..but that tail is so great! Inner upper arm?
Where is that print from?
It's from a dutch penny print from an amsterdams library's website. I know. The tail.
Do you think inner upper arm is good? Any other suggestions?
Inner upper arm is very good. In hindsight I would've gotten mine on the inside arm because when they are highly visible every nerd with tattoos tries to talk to you about them
Good point. I was also considering the ribs.
How is ny?
Trafficky
How is the tattoo?
Appt at 6
Good luck! Have fun!
It's beautiful! Where did you get it done?
East river tattoo by Liam sparkes. Do you really like it? I am in shock
I do. The shock takes a while to wear off. Permanence is hard to get used to
That is comforting. I feel like I can't even evaluate it.
Did you have a bandage on it that had an imprint of the tattoo on it when you took it off?
No. That sounds cool.
Prrrretty cool
How's the studying?

I'm waiting for the rest of my group for performance class. I think there is some sort of interpretive dance? It's in the way of the real work I have to do still. One more paper, and two finals to go!
Yay!
Interpretive dance= 18 year old dancing while I read spoken word
Is there video?
I hope not
Sounds amazing...
